resources.string:
Welcome to the DO YOU EVEN LIFT!!! app. In the app, you will be able to record you personal best for your gym exercises. 
 
Profile Button: This takes you to the menu where you can record your personal records! 
 
Compare Button: This allows you to compare your personal records with your friends. Must be connected via bluetooth 
 
Save Button: Saves the information in the text fields. 
 
Rate Button: This rates your personal records that you have entered. Scale is based on strength.
